I find it helpful to put unit tests in their own directory but in a
*differ=
ent* package from the code under test so that they must test
through the ob=
ject's public API and cannot cheat by using members with
package-scope visi=
bility.  I find it gives me quicker feedback on API
design issues.

I'll na=
me the test packages after the system packages, usually by
adding ".test" o=
n the end.  E.g.

project/src/package1
project/src/package2
project/unit-te=
sts/package1/tests
project/unit-tests/package2/tests
